body_html:
tf.reshape takes a tensor of ints as the shape argument. You are passing None, so it doesn't work. Maybe you want to replace x.get_shape()[0] with tf.shape(x)[0]?

Thanks a lot. tf.shape() works for me
body_text:
tf.reshape takes a tensor of ints as the shape argument. You are passing None, so it doesn't work. Maybe you want to replace x.get_shape()[0] with tf.shape(x)[0]?

Thanks a lot. tf.shape() works for me
body:
> `tf.reshape` takes a tensor of ints as the shape argument. You are passing None, so it doesn't work. Maybe you want to replace `x.get_shape()[0]` with `tf.shape(x)[0]`?

Thanks a lot. tf.shape() works for me
